ValidationRule.description: Alerts users that when data is missing in fields that are used to populate info into the welcome email.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL(Application_Status__c, "Setup Complete"), RecordType.Name = "National Retail",
OR( ISBLANK(National_Retail_Sara_Plus_Login__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the National Retail Sara Plus Login info before saving record.
